Item.Description: A fresh green apple. It is a bit sour.
Item.Name: Green Apple

Item.Description: A red apple fresh from the farm.
Item.Name: Red apple

Item.Description: A juicy yellow apple.
Item.Name: Yellow Apple

Item.Description: A ripe yellow banana. Do you like bananas?
Item.Name: Banana

Item.Description: A crisp carrot. Good for motivation
Item.Name: Carrot

Item.Description: A crisp stalk of celery. Grown in the sunshine.
Item.Name: Celery Stalk

Item.Description: A fresh baked cookie with chocolate chips. (Warning: Highly addictive.)
Item.Name: Cookie

Item.Description: A cupcake with a cherry on top.
Item.Name: Cupcake

Item.Description: A juicy fresh pear. Don't let the apple family catch you with one!
Item.Name: Pear

Item.Description: A musical flute.
Item.Name: Flute

Item.Description: This saxophone is epic!
Item.Name: Epic Sax

Item.Description: A trombone. Perfect for breaking the fourth wall.
Item.Name: Trombone

Item.Description: A trumpet.
Item.Name: Trumpet

Item.Description: A wonderful violin.
Item.Name: Violin

Item.Description: A chunk of ore. I wonder what it could be?
Item.Name: Chunk of Ore

Item.Description: Ponies are not capable of learning through osmosis, although that doesn't mean you can't try.
Item.Name: Book Hat

Item.Description: "Ze goggles! Zey do nuffink!" That's what you may think, but at least these protect your eyes from flies, whilst you're in the sky!
Item.Name: Goggles

Item.Description: All the better to study you with
Item.Name: Glasses

Item.Description: Worn faux leather
Item.Name: Cowpony Hat

Item.Description: Can also be used to carry juice, careful where you store it though. You don't want any mistakes.....
Item.Name: Potion Bags

Item.Description: Perfect for preventing chemical burns, also it helps give you an intelligent aura.
Item.Name: Lab Coat

Item.Description: Recommended use: Weasle stomping day
Item.Name: Boots

Item.Description: So shiny...
Item.Name: Gala boots

Item.Description: Pick goes in, rocks come out. You can't explain that!
Item.Name: Pickaxe

Item.Description: For when tapping won't cut it.
Item.Name: Hammer

Item.Description: A juicy strawberry
Item.Name: Strawberry

Item.Description: An excusite example of a strawberry dessert! Looks yummy!
Item.Name: Strawberry Torte

Item.Description: A crate of potions used for medicine.
Item.Name: Medical Potion Crate

Item.Description: Such fancy materials!
Item.Name: Stack of Cloth

Item.Description: Feeling hungry? Once you open this you can eat to your heart's content.
Item.Name: Food Box

Item.Description: A cap that shows you are an assitant nurse. (Although it is best to stay out of medical matters until you've had the proper training.)
Item.Name: Assistant Nurse Cap

Item.Description: A mysterious multi-coloured liquid.
Item.Name: Rainbow Essence

Item.Description: Nothing is getting through that. But just to be safe, don't try it.
Item.Name: Hard Hat

Item.Description: A potion that restores your health.
Item.Name: Health Potion

Item.Description: A wooden spoon, perfect for mixing things!
Item.Name: Mixing Spoon

Item.Description: Fire, on a stick! It's useful for providing light and also for lighting things that are hard to reach.
Item.Name: Torch

Item.Description: A water container. It also can make a cool helmet. But it's better as a water container.
Item.Name: Water Bucket

Item.Description: A water container. It also can make a cool helmet. But it's better as a water container. This one has water in it!
Item.Name: Water Bucket (Full)

Item.Description: A frozen drop of cloud essence. It could be useful to somepony.
Item.Name: Frozen Essence Drops

Item.Description: Zut alors! It's all for one, and one for fancy with this iconic piece of headwear.
Item.Name: Musketeer Hat

Item.Description: An egg, freshly laid and collected this morning. You'd better be careful with it, broken eggs in a saddlebag are no yolk!
Item.Name: Egg

Item.Description: The book Skyhammer gave me to return to Final Ink at the Canterlot Library.
Item.Name: Skyhammer's Book

Item.Description: A fine pastry topped with a mountain of whipped cream. Looks delicious.
Item.Name: Whipped Cream Pie

Item.Description: A freshly baked apple pie. Looks delicious.
Item.Name: Apple Pie

Item.Description: A gooseberry pie. Looks delicious.
Item.Name: Gooseberry Pie

Item.Description: A fabulous fusion of toffee, pie, and bananas. Looks delicious
Item.Name: Banoffee Pie

Item.Description: A nice strawberry pie. Looks delicious.
Item.Name: Strawberry Pie

Item.Description: A pie freshly made with raspberries. Looks delicious.
Item.Name: Raspberry Pie

Item.Description: A fresh cherry pie. Looks delicious.
Item.Name: Cherry Pie

Item.Description: A pie made with a blueberry filling. Looks delicious.
Item.Name: Blueberry Pie

Item.Description: Hmm, an empty pie tin, this could fit on my head...
Item.Name: Empty Pie Tin

Item.Description: General Messerchmitt's script. It's full of jargon and words that are long and weird. It makes me feel a bit sleepy.
Item.Name: General Messerschmitt's Speech

Item.Description: Ambitious ponies can earn one of these by sitting quietly through the esteemed general's lengthy war tales.
Item.Name: Messerchmitt's Letter of Recommendation

Item.Description: Adjustable leg barding, clearly pegasus in design.
Item.Name: Bronze Armor Legs

Item.Description: A finely crafted Cloudsdale champron, wearable by all races.
Item.Name: Bronze Armor Helmet

Item.Description: A durable peytral emblazoned with the emblem of a Cloudsdale craftspony.
Item.Name: Bronze Armor Chest

Item.Description: Designed for long stretches of wear. One size fits all.
Item.Name: Bronze Armor Boots

Item.Description: Carbon Chemistry never wore her lab goggles. Now she doesn't need them.
Item.Name: Lab Goggles

Item.Description: Bag full of scrolls
Item.Name: Scroll Bag

Item.Description: Look at all the things you can hold
Item.Name: Satchel Bag

Item.Description: Dont hit things too hard or you might break it
Item.Name: Wood Sword

Item.Description: AWWWWWWWWW MAAAAAAAN.
Item.Name: Ellowee's Hat

Item.Description: Careful where you wear this. You might mess up someone's perfect lawn.
Item.Name: Dandelion Bracelet

Item.Description: A freshly picked dandelion, it looks pretty.
Item.Name: Dandelion
